Summary: Saw A big bright round light flash towards me for about 2 or3 seconds then turned and moved to theleft and dissapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side in my back yard watching the stars. I was looking at one star and all of a sudden right below it a big round white flash turned towards me then became smaller moved to the left slightly and dissapeared. A second later I noticed a big plane to thewest of the flash I saw. It was much lower than the light I saw. It was almost like The light noticed the plane and turned the flash towards the plane then dissapeared very fast. The big round light I saw was in the south east of the sky and east of the air plane. I felt stunned and surprised. I never saw anything like that happen before. I watch the night sky when I can. It's very amazing to me and wondurous. The light I saw was very big and round and very bright. I just stood there afterwards to see if anything slse would happen. Then I went inside and told my husband and he came out but saw nothing. It was already gone.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sedro-Woolley
There was one other sighting in Sedro-Woolley on or around May 17th 2008
